resources.string: "please submit your enquiry to the veloeye team in the form below and we will respond as quickly as we can. You may also connect with us on our social media channels

Thanks for scanning me, as you can see I've been registered with veloeye as all is good!

 My owner might not be with me right now but will be able to see that I have just been scanned which is great help as it shows that one of the veloeye community has taken time to scan me .


 We need all the eyes we can get to combat bike theft,so please do keep scanning any veloeye-tagged bikes
our complete terms and conditions & GDPR privacy policy are available on the Veloeye website here
Please hover the window below over the sticker code to scan the sticker and get the status of the bike
Please enter your pnn email address and password in the form below to log in to veloeye app
Incorrect email address or password, please try again
Please log in using your \n email address and password
Password and confirmation password don\'t match
Account created, you can log in now
Server is not responding or there are some networking issues, please check your network and try again later.
Are you sure you want to mark this bike as stolen? This will send alerts out to social media.
Are you sure you want to mark this bike as active?
The owner of the bike has reported the bike stolen!
Options:1. Report this location to the owner by clicking the button
There was a problem saving the photoâ€¦
Please check the edit fields, something is wrong.
Something went wrong while sending the survey, please try again.
Thank you for completing the survey.
Something went wrong while sending data, please try again.
ACTIVE BIKE SCANNED!\n\nHey, thanks for scanning me! The owner has registered their bike with Veloeye and everything is good.
Keep scanning, we need\nall the eyes we can get!
If you have photos of your bike you may upload them using the uploader
Please enter your data in the form below for your stickered bike
Please enter your email address in the form below and we will send you a link to reset your password
Please enter your details in the form below to create your veloeye account.Details will be emailed to you post-registration
To change the status of your bike please tap on the green Active box (or red Stolen to change it back to Active)
Please enter your registered email address and password in the form below to log into veloeye application

You are logged into the veloeye app as an authorised police officer user.This wil number the registered name and mobile number of any veloeye labelled bike which you can scan by tapping the \"scan a sticker\" icon above
How soon after reported as stolen was retrieved?
You are about to delete a bike from your account .Once this is done the bike will no longer be accessible
You have chosen to transfer ownership of the selected bike from your account to another veloeye user.
Please enter the username who will assume ownership of the bike
How far from stolen location was bike when found?
Would you say Veloeye helped get the bike back?
Stolen bike was scanned, you can see more details by touching this notification.
These are the locations where your stolen bike was scanned. Last location is marked with red.
Camera and storage permissions are required in order to take fully advantage of this app.
Camera and location permissions are required in order to take fully advantage of this app.
Location permission is required in order to take fully advantage of this app.
These permissions are required in order to take fully advantage of this app.
Camera permissions are required for scanning.
Contact the owner (name in here) on their mobile number(number here)
